<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209778</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Tell-Tale Heart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Klatschsüchtige Innere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Coeur Indicateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Coração Indicador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Cuore Rivelatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αποκαλυπτική καρδιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Corazón Indicador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A narrative performance of Edgar Allan Poe's "The Tell-Tale Heart," with subtle sound effects to enhance mood.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine erzählende Leistung Edgar Allan Poes "des 
klatschsüchtigen Inneren," mit den subtilen stichhaltigen Effekten, 
zum von von Stimmung zu erhöhen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une exécution narrative du coeur indicateur 
d'Edgar Allan Poe "," avec des effets sains subtiles pour mettre en 
valeur l'humeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um desempenho narrativo do coração indicador de 
Edgar Allan Poe "," com os efeitos sadios subtle para realçar o modo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lle prestazioni narrative del cuore rivelatore di 
Edgar Allan Poe "," con gli effetti sani sottili per aumentare umore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια αφηγηματική απόδοση του Edgar Allan Poe's 
"η αποκαλυπτική καρδιά," με τα λεπτά υγιή αποτελέσματα για να 
ενισχύσει τη διάθεση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un funcionamiento narrativo del corazón indicador
de Edgar Allan Poe "," con los efectos sonoros sutiles para realzar 
humor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SHORT STORY BY EDGAR ALLAN POE.  NARRATION AND PRODUCTION BY URGELT.  SOUND EFFECTS BY HELLO_FLOWERS AND STUDIORAT.
FN:SHORT STORY BY EDGAR ALLAN POE.  NARRATION AND PRODUCTION BY URGELT.  SOUND EFFECTS BY HELLO_FLOWERS AND STUDIORAT.
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
